website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate women's motorcycle jacket that is lightweight, eye-catching, and affordable.
pros: Quilting details give the jacket a luxurious appearance
Faux leather jacket is soft to the touch
Sold in a broad array of attractive colors
Form-fitting jacket is a great option for women of all heights
cons: Jacket lining tends to wear down quickly
Zippered pockets leave much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love this jacket! super cute and comfy. really good quality for being feux leather. I ordered a medium and it fits as expected (I'm 5 feet tall, about 130 lbs, 34c bust)
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite jacket!! 10/10!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this jacket enough! The size is perfect, the quality is stellar....it's just a great buy! I am 5'2, 125lbs and I usually wear between a small and a medium. I got the small and it fits like a glove! I like a fitted look, so there's no room for a thick hoodie in this size. I would say buy a size up from your usual if you want to layer it. This is a VERY flattering jacket! This is my new favorite! I even want to start learning how to ride a motorcycle it looks so good! 10/10 for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing quality for the price. Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this jacket! It seems to be made very well and the quilting is beautiful. I sized up as I assumed this was china-sizing and was surprised when I got it and noticed I could have stuck with my normal size. I'm 5'10" and the sleeves are pefectly long as well! I love the fact that the hood is removeable as well. I cant recommend this jacket enough!
customer_reviews.author: mollie easley

customer_reviews.title: Cute Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Love the jacket but I wish I had ordered an XL, the jacket ran smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: WJC877 fits me SO well and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: For reference: I'm 5'7" and around 150 lbs. I'm fairly busty (36 C) with a long torso. Just got this jacket (size Medium) in the mail, and I absolutely love it! This was my 3rd attempt at finding a jacket that is perfect for fall or spring, loose enough to wear a sweatshirt underneath should I need to, has long enough arms, and is long enough in the torso. This checks all of those boxes, and is very well made. Overall, I'm very impressed with the design and VERY happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’4” and 120lbs, athletic build. This jacket fits like a glove and draws lots of attention every time I wear it. Perfect for a chilly fall day because it’s also quite warm!
customer_reviews.author: annabella

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from Lock and Love expecting a jacket with the Lock and Love tag and received a jacket "Made By Johnny". If I wanted a MBJ jacket, i would have ordered it from that seller and saved money since they sell the same jacket for $10 cheaper. The quality of the jacket is very cheap and is much smaller than expected. I ordered a large and it was very snug on the arms, my niece who wears a size 4 and weighs 115lbs fits it perfectly. This sizing chart was very misleading and I will be sending this back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: LoveLaFaye818

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail and absolutely love how it fits! It’s not as long as the picture seems to show but it’s no big deal, I still love it. I’m 5’5” and 165lbs and I ordered the XL. I typically wear a size large in shirts so I wanted to make sure it wasn’t too snug for thick sweaters and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: brook

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love. I bought according to the size chart--because I'm incredibly busty (DDD), I went with an XXL. However, when I received it, it was MASSIVE. Definitely didn't go along with what the size chart said. I exchanged it for a large instead. The fit was incredible after that. The other reviews were right about it short. But not unbearably so. I was pleasantly surprised because I'm tall (5'9") with a long torso and it's fit is awesome. Great quality, great smell too. ;] Random Note: When I got my XXL jacket, it came and the brand was Johnny. When my large came, it was Lock and Love. Not sure what is going on there.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so it has nothing to do with the offered product, It's a totally different product than what was offered
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, perfect for cool days.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" amd 206lbs. I usually wear a L or XL top and 14-16 bottoms. I got a size XXL. This jacket fits snugly, but with the style, it's meant to. Slightly too tight across the shoulders but not too much and it doesn't stop me from wearing it. I think once it gets "broken in" it'll be perfect. Sleeves are the perfect length and it's really cute with the thumb holes and hood. I can't wear a heavy sweatshirt under it but with a tee shirt or blouse it's fine. I've gotten a few compliments and I've only wore it a couple times. Great light fall jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi XIX

customer_reviews.title: I can give Maverick a run for his money!
customer_reviews.text: Stats: 5'7 103 and purchased a small tan jacket. It fit perfectly, yes, it's a little short but I expected that. I wore a long tank underneath and the outfit was complete. I have never gotten so many compliments. Reminded me of one of the jackets from Top Gun. And of course, had the shades to match. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Balfazar

customer_reviews.title: Huge jacket, terrible stitching, and jingles with every movement!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is way too big and not well made. Very boxy. 125 lbs, 5’6” and I got a small. The arms are long, the waist has almost no contour fit to it. Not flattering at all. The zippers at the hands jingle, are long, and get in the way. When putting it on for the first time, several loose seams in the arm got pulled loose! It looks like a beginner sewer sewed the jacket. The material is the only redeeming quality about the jacket. It’s not perfect, obviously, for $50, but it’s okay. Seems like it would be warm. But overall, not happy with this product compared to a similar style by another company I got.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7 155lbs and bought a size up to a large as I usually wear a medium and it fits great! I only have an issue with a small hole in the pocket, but I can fix that. The hood is zipped all the way around the top which I love. It has been 30 degrees outside and has kept me very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna N. Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket! Love the look and feel! Arrived as expected timely and with a good fit!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about this item being either to big or too small. I would agree that it runs small, however that isn't a problem. I just ordered a size up and was just fine. I am 5'7 and I weigh 145, normally i use a size medium for a nice form fit, which is want we all want with jackets like these. I purchased a large and it fits just as I expected it to fit. It is a nice form fit - I can wear a long sleeve t-shirt underneath and still be comfortable. I have no issue raising my arms or any of that nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Morris

customer_reviews.title: The sizes on this jacket are not USA sizes. They are much more like Chinese sizing.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was way to small. I always buy an extra large. This jacket was not an extra large. When I put my arms in on both sides, the linning came out the sleeve with my hands. It is extremely short. The quality and construction was very poor. The inner zipper zipped up on the sweatshirt material. The jacket is not as large as the sweatshirt material, and could not be zipped. Very poor quality, sizing and construction. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lona Priest-Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" 136lbs. 36 C. I ordered a large. I will be able to wear a sweater underneath. If you want "fitted" order a Medium. Sleeves hit mid hand! (Rare) No smell, not too wrinkled, soft and comfy. Bottom hits top of my hips, waist is not too tapered or tight, but gives a waistline. Tag says Lock and Love. Hood is not too small. Good quality for price, showed up a day and a half after I ordered it. If you're on the fence just order it.
customer_reviews.author: ELWoods

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a little more on the grey side than the dark black I thought I would be getting. Overall I'm happy with it. I'm 5'8 at 135lbs and the medium fits perfectly. It's roomy enough to fit a couple layers under it but fits well enough not to look baggy. Love that the hood is able to be removed making it look a little more dressy. No bad smell in the fabric and feels like a soft worn old jacket.
customer_reviews.author: mrshecty

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the jacket didnt look exactly as pictured 😕 it's similar but I was hoping for exactly what's pictured. Maybe if I had got extra small it would have been better. I'm not tiny but I like a form fitting type of fit. I am 5'2 130 lbs and 38 28 38 measurements. ( for reference I do my breast measurements around my breasts and not my under bust and I wear a 34ddd bra ) also the quality is no where near work the price. Seams on the sleeve near the thumb hole are already looking like they will be separating quickly and I've only tried the jacket on so far. Super disappointed with this purchase 😭
customer_reviews.author: stephany

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality and feel of the jacket. At first glance I thought it was going to be too big but I ordered one size up from what I normally wear and I love how it fits. I thought the hood part was removable but it's not. Doesn't have too much stretch, but it's still comfortable. For reference I normally wear a large, 5'8, 176 lb, 34DD
customer_reviews.author: Krizetien

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket gives you nice form
customer_reviews.text: The jacket came and quality material was better than I thought - but it’s still new. I love that the arms are not tight and the jacket has a nice weight to it. Sleeves are a bit long but that’s ok. I am 5’2, 38/40C and 165 pounds athletic build. Got an XL which is too big. But it’s perfect when I remove the zip up mock hoodie and wear my real one underneath. This jacket makes me feel very bold and empowered! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KiKi

customer_reviews.title: Ugh...to big, to short... got a long torso? JUST SAY NO!
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I bought a size up. I usually where a medium, so I bought a large. I think a medium would have been fine. (For reference, I’m 5’4”, 150, longer than ave torso, 36d-ish, petite pants) Positives: it’s super cute...? The large fits ok and isn’t tight? Idk that really it... Negative, looks weird zipped up, obviously too big but still (to me looks weird, which means I can’t wear it when it’s actually cold which defeats the purpose) And the killer is for me at least it’s way too short!!! Look at this?! And my arms aren’t even raised?!!🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Nikki R

customer_reviews.title: Best fall jacket! Looks and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking LOVE this jacket! It was my first jacket I bought off amazon so I was skeptical. I wanted a nice leather looking casual jacket but didn't want to pay hundreds of dollars. This jacket is AWESOME. It's durable, thick, and WARM. This looks good and will keep you warmed up even in chilly temps. The perfect fall jacket. I am norally a size 6, 5'5 135lbs and ordered a size small in camel. Fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful, I boyght a Black jacket (looks worn)
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful, I boyght a Black jacket (looks worn), has a black coat inside and you can be removed. I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, wrong color, looks nothing like photo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this months ago, then in took another two months to get delivered. It looks nothing like the photo and they sent brown instead of black. Since it took so long to recieve and they couldn't get the color right the first time, not worth asking for a swap. Just counting it as a loss. The fit is big and loose, not form fitting. The hood has strings that broke immediately. The inside of the lining is falling apart after owning for less than 6 months and only wearing a few times due to colder winter weather. DON'T BUY THIS COAT!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Trendy faux leather jacket
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a extra large becayse other reviews said it ran small. But it was way too big on me. So I returned it for a medium, my normal size. I'm 5'9 and 160 pounds, normally a size 8 or medium and im busty. I wear a 32 DDD. The sleeve lenghth is just a smidge on the short side, but I expect that with my height. Pay attention to what style you order, because the same color is in multiple styles for this jacket. It's a little cropped on me, but just enough for my shirt to peek out the bottom. overall, it's trendy and comfortable. It squeaks a little because if the material.
customer_reviews.author: Julia henkin

customer_reviews.title: Super cute- runs very small.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket definitely runs small. I wear a large normally (though I am busty) and I ordered this jacket in a 2X and it’s still a little tight, but I was wearing a heavy sweater. I did not feel like the jacket was exceptionally short, but the style is shorter so the length was basically as I expected. I love the coffee color, and the longer sleeve with a hole for your thumb. I will definitely be keeping the jacket and hoping I lose 10 pounds. Seems well made. There were a few straggly strings but overall very nice.
customer_reviews.author: larysalove

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually take a large size, but I read in the reviews of the product that the size was only about 50% accurate so I ordered XXL. It is so small that there is at least a 6 inch gap between the sides of the zipper. Nice jacket, but don't believe the size!
customer_reviews.author: Esther R. Makower

customer_reviews.title: Love this biker/bomber style jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is gorgeous. Perfect fit, looks just like the pic, and nice thick hoodie. Even washed in delicate cycle (twice) and hung to dry. No problems. XL fits 5' 1" & 5' 3" gals 170+lbs 36D 11/2016: 1 Year Update Have washed this several times in delicate & hung dry...still looks good! No issues with seams, buttons or zippers. My daughter wears this regularly, doesn't look cheap & pretty warm for Californian winter days. Its is a bomber style so it's not tapered or fitted.
customer_reviews.author: LMSTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: After few wears, inside lining is falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product knowing the shipping was going to take a while. Once I received it, I loved it. But after only a few wears, the inside of the jacket where the sleeves are sewn together are coming apart. The inside material is cheap and I'm going to have to sew both of the insides of the sleeves after only a 3-4 wears. I was very disappointed because I loved this jacket and the look but it's not lasted at all. I paid $54 for this jacket and it's definitely not been worth the wait or the cost.
customer_reviews.author: lmad5989

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried that the jacket would be too small and actually tried to cancel my order. For once, I’m really happy the cancellation didn’t go through. I’m 5’6” about 180lbs and the 2X fits perfectly. I’d have room for thinner layers if need be. Length is perfect. Sizing is weird, but so far I’m very impressed with the quality of the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I lovd this jacket. I ordered the one with the hoodie attached and the thumb holes through hoodie material. It's the only reason I've enjoyed our occasionally cooler weather here in deep south Texas. I don't think it would be warm enough for the snowy northern states, but would be great for spring and fall like weather. If you want it fitted, then the sizing is spot on. If you want it looser, you may want to size up one size. I am 5'1", 38DD bust, wear xlarge/large in shirts, and weigh approximately 156lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Snug arm holes
customer_reviews.text: The jacket had a weird, almost fishy smell. A lot of clothes I’ve ordered online have a strange smell, so I didn’t mind it too much, was just going to wash it. It was small though. I ordered a large, which I usually wear, and I could bRely zip it up. I have larger breasts, so this happens from time to time and isn’t always a deal breaker. The arms are super snug too though. Even to wear the jacket open, not zipped, the armpit and upper arm region is extremely tight. I can barely move my arms in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Bakas

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size, but decent enough to gift
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent quality product, but I got the wrong size. The sleeves are tiny and the measurements are much smaller than listed (especially in the bust) and yet I have to say I'd have been very happy with it if it had fit. I don't think I'd wear it in a Michigan winter without a hoodie underneath, though. I meant to get an XL, but as I don't have the time or money to deal with the hassle of a refund/return, I'm going to have to eat the $60 and give it to a friend. Sucks, but I think she will like it. I'd happily try again, but I don't know if I want to lose another $60.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Not Dark Black Nor Accurate Fit
customer_reviews.text: Profile: 5'3 @ 100lbs Normal clothing size: XS Jacket size ordered: XS Pros: Doesn't feel cheap or too low quality Overall style is nice Not heavy. Medium weight. Cons: Color is more like a faded black. Not dark black like the product image. Size does not feel like an XS. It feels more like a Small. The length was to the top of my hip bone. In summary, I def was not as excited as I was expecting to be. I was actually disappointed because of the color and fit. In my case it ran larger. Returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Product Tester

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: John's wife speaking: I'm 155 lbs, 5'3". I have wider shoulders. This jacket is very pretty to look at, feels good In your hands, too. My only complaints are that it gets tight when I bend my elbows and it has a somewhat odd shape on the sides of the breasts when it isnt zipped up. Like of like it curves out like a bra would to support breasts even when you're not wearing it. I think itll be warm in cool weather and it feels like pretty heavy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Baby, this is the ONE
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for my perfect leather jacket for ages. AGES. I have three others that are fine but this is the one. It doesn't have any stupid buckles or belts flopping around, it's tight in the right places and accentuates my shape but still allows me to move around and cross my arms. For reference, I'm 5'11, 6,'0 in shoes, 120ish lbs, and my measurements are 34/26/36, and I got a small in style WJC664
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is exactly what I had envisioned when I started looking for an inexpensive riding jacket. I ride "sissy" on the back of a Harley Davidson and wanted to be warmer when we ride during the cooler months in Florida. This jacket is stylish, warm and not bulky! I am 5' 0" and 115-120 lbs. with a 36" bust and the small fit me perfectly. The material is beautiful & the fit is sexy!! 5 stars of happiness!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket and it looks great with everything
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket and it looks great with everything. I ordered it about a month ago, just in time for the weather to turn cold (30-40*F at 6am) rather early and I’ve worn it almost every day since. After reading the reviews, I ordered an XL, being 5’3” and 160lbs, with a relatively large chest. It fit slightly big in some places and I considered returning it for a smaller size but ultimately I kept it. Most jackets I find are too tight through the arms and shoulders but this fix almost perfectly in that regard, although the sleeves were a little long.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality even though it’s not exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little on the small side, and the picture showed sleeve inserts with thumb holes. I was counting on those to make sure the sleeves were long enough for my 5’11” long arms. However, they are much longer without the inserts than I’d expected (hit just above the wrist). It’s tight through the arms - but I can wear a long sleeves light sweater underneath. The material is fantastic - people who saw me in it and felt it couldn’t tell it wasn’t real leather. Super cute and I’m very happy with the value for the $. If I were buying again, I’d probably consider going up another size.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bird

customer_reviews.title: I love it but I had to go 2 size up
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered a Large because I know that even if I'm a medium, having large shoulders and long arms, I needed to size up. I received this amazing jacket and...it's too short on my arms, too tight on my chest and small on my shoulders. I could barely move. So I exchanged for an XL. Well...now it's way too big on my bust but it's perfect on shoulders and arms. I'm gonna keep it but I still wonder why in 2019 we don't make things that properly fit people like me. For reference, I'm athletic, skinny, 5'9".
customer_reviews.author: denny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time on this jacket. It looks nothing like the picture. It is cheap chinese-made garbage. And the sizing chart is way way off. These run huge. I ordered a medium first so I could fit layers under it but it was so huge I couldn't wear it so I sent it back to try a small and it's not much smaller. I could wrap it around me twice. It's also not very nice looking. The material is ugly. Nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: PaperOrchid

customer_reviews.title: I think they forgot to finish stitching the jacket
customer_reviews.text: So, the sizing issue, I'm not going to get too upset because I made the call to buy a medium. Wrong call. Even worse was making the call to buy this jacket. I open up the package and inspected the jacket. Threads hanging from the sleeve, and the inside of the coat. I never saw anything like it. I wanted to return it but I found the tag was off the jacket and return policy is that it still should be attached. I feel a little scammed here.
customer_reviews.author: Kija

customer_reviews.title: Shoulders are puffed out
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits perfect and I love the color, however I didn’t realize the shoulders were puffed out like they are. I’m writing this review so others will recognize this as well. It’s shown in the pic but you have to look for it. I missed it and thought the shoulders were normal. I don’t like the puffed out look on me, it makes it seem boxy, so I’m returning. Disappointed because it fits great otherwise. I’ll try a different style.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Read the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jacket for a Cosplay of Scarlett Witch, I'm 5'9 and between a 10 and 12. 170 lbs. I originally purchased a large, but the sleeves were a bit short for my liking. I ended up with an XL. I liked the length on my arms way better and didn't mind the extra room in the jacket. I mean for the price it's very well made, I like the sweater material for the hoodie. This jacket isn't super breathable, but if you are wanting to keep warm well this does a good job. Plus side is that it is fashionable to wear when I'm not using it for cosplay.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size, runs small. I always wear large, and medium on occasion. Based on "true to size" reviews, I ordered a large. Couldn't zip the outer shell at all. Ordered an XL and it fits fine, but still slightly snug. It is a beautiful jacket for the price, nice details and seems well made. Definitely does run small, however sleeves are plenty long for longer arms in both the large and XL.
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: Runs EXCESSIVELY SMALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quality made coat. It durable and heavy. But it's what we would call "japanese sizing" We had found this on another site where it said the XXL was equal to an american size 16 so we ordered it for my daughter. It was back ordered for months. When we found it on amazon we canceled and ordered here. It arrived very quickly but, needless to say it was nowhere NEAR an american size 16. More like an american 12-14. I wear a size S/M and it fit me with just a few inches of space spare. This is really NOT accurate in sizing! Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Martz

customer_reviews.title: Not durable interior
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved this jacket. She wanted a cute option for vacation in NY with cooler weather. This was perfect for her. Unfortunately, the 2nd time she wore it, she noticed that the inside lining was torn at the seam going down the side below the arm hole (internal lining to lining, not to the exterior fabric). She was disappointed, but we figured we could sew it closed. The next day, she realized that the other side was tearing as well. She ordered this big enough to comfortably close it without pulling, so I know it wasn't her fault. This is an error in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Purkey

customer_reviews.title: fits beautifully & looks more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is exactly what I was looking for! A slim, tailored jacket with enough slouch to give it an edge. The detail and hardware are terrific for the price point. Zippers on both the inner faux-sweatshirt placket and on the outer placket. Reinforced thumb holes on the faux-sweatshirt cuffs. Enough wiggle room to allow layering. Nice rich brown color with some naturalistic shading: doesn't look cheap. A believable leather from a few feet away. I'm 5 feet 2 inches, 127 pounds, and the XS fir beautifully. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fabulous Jacket is a great way to describe this fashionable purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought and received this gorgeous faux leather coat, before I saw it on display on the Today show with Hoda and Kathie Lee. The woman who had them all lined up, and showed the audience at home that they came in different colors! As you look at them, keep in mind that they are super comfortable, and you can remove the hoodie anytime you want. One of the most important things to remember about this jacket is that it runs a little on the smaller size. I usually take a Medium but ordered a large and it fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket for the price
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was surprisingly nice quality. I love the soft material and I was glad that, not only does the hood detach, but also the rest of the hoodie insert in the front. I am usually a medium but sized up to a large based on other reviews. This way I can comfortably layer underneath it and it hits at my hip. The conch on the back and sides of this jacket keeps it form fitting enough that it doesn’t look boxy or bulky. It was exactly what I was hoping for in a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's usually too hot where I live to wear it (yes, even in the winter) the few times I've been able to, I love it. I can't speak to the durability of it since I wasn't able to wear it too much. I'm 5' 110lbs and I purchased a small. It fits surprisingly well. The only problem I have personally is the thumb holes are a smidge too high to be comfortable using them, but since the rest of the jacket fits, that's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: flickagal07

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you look at the Jack like close up sometimes things look a little different online ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you look at the Jack like close up sometimes things look a little different online than they do when you purchase them . Not that it's a bad jacket because I did decide to keep it . It is short in the torso and in the arms when you stretch your arms straight out. It does fit a little snug I had to order an extra extra large , And I typically would wear a large . Other than that I have had no problems with it and it seems to hold up so far .
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cool design. Didn't work for petite frame.
customer_reviews.text: The design is awesome, I was just bummed that I have to return it due to the size. I'm 5'-0", 100lbs and the XS was too big. The body might have passed but the sleeves were very loose and a tad long. The fit at the underarms hung a little low as well. Again, not a knock on the jacket itself - just a word of warning for any other petite gals out there. Hopefully they'll come out with a petite size option!
customer_reviews.author: Mon Alicia

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS JACKET! (Black hoodie with thumb hole cuffs)
customer_reviews.text: (Review for the hoodie with thumb holes) This jacket is absolutely everything I have been looking for. The layered look and soft feeling and “leather” has a real and casual look. I sized up so I can wear it over a a sweater but if I were only planning to wear it over a T-shirt, I probably would have bought my normal size. It’s so comfy and made really well. The thumb holes are actually in the right spot and there are functional zippered pockets. The hood can zip out, cuffs can not.
customer_reviews.author: @Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not the same red, very different.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing color!! I ordered it expecting it would be the very vibrant fire engine red as it is in the product picture. When it arrived, the red was different, it was dull, nearly wine color, and muted. Such a shame! Wanted the vibrant red as it is in the picture. Product was described as "removable hooded" but there was no hood attached. Just the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: C. Win

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit due to design
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality faux leather jacket. If it had fit, I could tell it would definitely keep me warm. I am 5'2/180 lbs/ 36 GG and my shoulders are 19" wide. Unfortunately the sizing chart does not give the shoulder dimensions. Bc the shoulder were too small this jacket didnt fit my back causing for tightness in the armpit as well with little to no room for movement. I was ok with the jacket falling just at the bottom of my belly button however I have a short torso and don't recommend this for a taller lady.
customer_reviews.author: Steener

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Great quality! I originally ordered a XXL but it was slightly too big in the sleeves and waist. I returned it for an XL and if fits perfectly. I am 5'7", 200lbs, long torso and smaller in the chest. Be aware that different jacket styles have different size charts. Returning/refund/shipping was fast and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: Great quality coat for the price. I'm 5'10, 170lbs and I am busty. The large fits great, while a little tight in the bust, but I expected that. I love it an ot is quite warm for fall nights.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani M.

customer_reviews.title: Faux Leather is bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket because I wanted a cheapish fake leather jacket. The weight of the jacket is good. It is very comfortable, and the fit was okay. I had to return it though because it was so shinny and squeaky. It was obviously a faux leather, which I don't usually mind, but it wasn't high quality. Not worth 50 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Box

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before buying, so I knew to order a large instead of my usual medium. The large fits me nicely, not too tight, not too short. I'm 5'3, about 135lbs, and wear a size 36C/D bra. The faux leather looks real and is not shiny or plasticy looking. I would call this a medium-weight jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mollygrimm

customer_reviews.title: Very very true to size!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read most reviews before buying this but I also looked for woman that took pics around my size and what size they got. I decide to stick with a size small and I’m glad I did! I weigh 138 lbs bust size 34 DDD wear a size x-small-small shirts and pant size 4. This jacket is so cute and stylish and my thumbs fit in the thumb holes comfortably. Quality looks good but only time will tell, so we’ll see. This jacket fits good around my waste and fits over my chest, still a little tight on my chest but still very comfortable and keeps me warm. Very happy with my purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Taurusgrl

customer_reviews.title: Great looking casual jacket
customer_reviews.text: I am 142 lbs, 5'2" and a 36c/d bra. I ordered a medium in black and it looks great on me. It is a bit loose in mid section but I kinda like it that way as it is fitted, but not too bad. The color is a worn black color, the hoodie part is dark. The hood material looks like sweatshirt hoodie. I will update once I have worn it out and post a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Reyj

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got the WJC1347 in Large. It fit perfectly and looked very feminine, coming in on the waist and sitting at hip. Some have mentioned small pockets but they're deep enough to put a whole hand in, which I like because I often walk with my hand in pocket. I don't have dainty hands at all but it;s definitely more suited to hands than carrying cellphones (imagine that). Very well made and looks "real," didn't have any smell whatsoever. I am going to buy more in other colors. Great value! (will add photo later)
customer_reviews.author: Shimska

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable jacket
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear XL or XxL depending on the style. I have a large chest. I usually wear size 14. I ordered XXL. It doesn’t zip but honestly I never zip up my jackets anyway. Leather jackets tend to run a bit small in general I think. Nice quality and fits comfortably. I love that the sleeves are not the leather material because I can move my arms freely.
customer_reviews.author: love2shop

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful jacket
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jacket. It fits well, though I’d prefer it to be slightly bigger. It’s actually warm! It’s easy to care for and looks nice. I’ve had it over a year now and it still looks practically new and I wear it frequently, even out in bad weather. I love that the hood is detachable. Overall, great purchase! I am really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: LondontoBerlin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS JACKET! I typically wear a size small, went up one size so i could wear some thicker shirts under the jacket. The sleeves (where the "sweatshirt" sleeve and outer shell seam) is a bit tight.. but not unmanageable. Could have ordered a large and been completely fine. Just depends on weather you want a more fitted, or looser jacket. I have 5'8" and 130 lbs. for reference. The hood is perfectly placed & sized. Can dress up or down this jacket.. such a great staple for any wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Money

customer_reviews.title: The fitting looks great on me and I have deemed this my main ...
customer_reviews.text: Never have I gotten so many compliments on a jacket as I have with this one, just in the first couple days of wearing it!! Fits to form and keeps me warm. The fitting looks great on me and I have deemed this my main go to now. This is not really a biker feeling jacket, but just an everyday, workable one that is easy to slip on and off and is very workable as far as pairing it to outfits.
customer_reviews.author: april franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very flattering! It's very comfortable and soft. It fits me perfectly, I wear XL/16 tops and I bought XXL in this jacket. If I wore low rise pants then maybe it would be too short. The only complaint I have is that it came with creases where it was folded and stuffed into a plastic bag, for easy shipping, I guess. This jacket makes me look like I have an hourglass figure. I love it!! The camel color is perfect, it is a little darker but it matches perfectly with a pair of boots I already had. For reference I am 5'4" 185lbs. If your on the fence.... Get it, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Girly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy two!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered a size too big and was going to return it but my roommate saw it and wanted it so now we both have them! I am 5'0'' and petite and ordered a size small, when I tried it on, the arms were a bit too long and it was kinda baggy. As I was trying it on, my roommate saw it and she is a few inches taller than me and I asked her if she wanted to try it on. It looks badass on her ! So I ordered an XS which is what you can see in the pictures above.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket for fall and spring. It's not too baggy or too tight. I can wash it in my washer and it does just fine. This is a great leather alternative and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love it but armpit seam ripped after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: **Update** just discovered the pocket stitching is coming part now so I have to downgrade this rating. Very poor quality and I’m sad I wasted my $ on this jacket. It looks good but the quality is crap, even though I knew I wasn't spending top dollar.... I LOVE this jacket but am VERY disappointed that after only 5 weeks, it has ripped at the armpit seam. I am past the return point but will be contacting the seller. Gave it three stars because otherwise, it’s a great jacket and I get compliments every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cute bomber/hoodie combo
customer_reviews.text: Love the whole jacket. It’s summer so I am not sure about warmth or longevity, but look and feel is perfect. I’m 5’7” 210 and top heavy Shoulders/waist/40D. It’s a little snug not leaving room for bulky clothing. Go with 3x if you want a roomier fit. I have long arms and the sleeves are just barely long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Burke

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY A SIZE UP!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the jacket. It does have a weird smell but I'm sure it will go away. Sadly I made the HUGE mistake to pay attention to the reviews saying that the jacket runs small. I'm 5'8" and 120 lbs 34DD and usually wear S on jackets so I ordered the size M following the advise to order a size up. The thing is huge, I'm sending it back today and ordering a size smaller...I'm even tempted to order the XS. The quality is nice, doesn't look plastic, etc. I'm not short by any means and the length of the jacket and arms is perfectly fine. One star down because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews. I normally wear a size Large, but in the reviews, some people were saying that the jacket didn't fit. So, I decided to order a size XXL and it fits so cute and perfect!!! I'm definitely buying another one! Thank you so much! The jacket feels so nice to the touch. I may update with a picture, but I just recommend that you go up two sizes from what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Loving it! (XXL)
customer_reviews.text: First off love it! The lower arms were a little big, but besides that it fit like a charm. I am 5'9 and just shy of 200 lbs. I ordered a size XXL with a hood. I have plenty of room. The hood zips out too which makes it super functional. I am in love with it! I feels like a super high quality jacket and has a bit of weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and reasonable
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute! The material is very soft and not the shiny, smelly bad faux leather that I’ve seen in stores. It’s more of a faded grayish black than a true black though. It does run small like other reviews said so size up. I have a long torso and this would have been cropped looking and probably not zipped over my bust if I bought my normal size (5’9” size 6 jeans 36DD and got the XL) The sleeves were fine and I love the built in thumb holes for when I’m on the back of hubby’s motorcycle. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket and got it because I ride motorcycles ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece because I ride motorcycles in Northern California where it's chilly at night in the summer. The quality is amazing, it looks like real leather, and the design is beautiful. I am 5'5", 124 lbs, and a 34C. I ordered a size small because one of the other reviews said to maybe order a size lower. That didn't work for me but if someone were not riding a motorcycle and were just looking for a fashionable jacket this would probably be fine. I have to bring my arms together to ride my bike and this also wouldn't fit over anything like an additional layer. Great product, seller and sipping/return service!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my gray jacket today and i am IN LOVE. i am SO HAPPY i took the risk, $50 for a jacket is very expensive for me, but i don’t regret it at all. It’s only been a couple hours so i hope it holds up nicely. I’m a thick girl, about 200lbs and 5’3. The 2xl fits perfectly, i was very worried it was going to be too big and i’m pleasantly surprised to find out it fits perfectly! Definitely recommend as of right now. Hopefully it stays put together nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, different versions are sent
customer_reviews.text: My wife was really looking forward to this jacket after hers was stolen. NOT AS PICTURED OR DESCRIBED. It has the "curve" lines in the middle, but its not by any means an hour glass shape, and it DOES NOT reach hips, as described, and shown. It is about 3-4" shorter than advertised, described, or shown. Update: wanted me to pay shipping to send it back even though it was falsely advertised by them. They wouldn't work with us. Obviously I don't recommend this item at all, or the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not for the busty lady.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2XL as I'm very busty (36O US) and 2XL usually fits. It's long enough, but there isn't enough power in the world to convince it to zip up. I still wear it unzipped, because I still spent 60$, but I'm disappointed. Also, the sleeves feel l ok ng enough, but putting my thumbs in the thumb holes is uncomfortable after a while, it leaves a bright red line and indentation on the web between the thumb and index finger.
customer_reviews.author: Kailynne Degan

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice quality but way too small
customer_reviews.text: Order at least 2 sizes up! I ordered this, it seemed very nice quality but could not even get it on as the shoulders were way too small and i could tell it wouldnt zip as it was too small. Most leather jackets require a bit a stretching but this wasn't that. Other than that seemed like a nice jacket and I had a refund within a couple days when I had to return it. If you are tiny, order size or more up, if you have any part of you that isnt tiny, buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying this jacket
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a medium but ended up returning and getting a large instead. (I am 5'4" and about 150lbs) But the return and swap process was quick and easy so I applaud them there for sure. The medium fit me but was a little on the snug side and I wouldn't be able to fit a thin sweater or layers under as comfortably so I decided to move to the large to give myself a little more wiggle room. I have had it over a month now and can already tell the quality will last me years to come so I am quite pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RecordsHD

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to this is it's not a full black color, it's like a muted black. Which is fine because I loooove it. Fits perfectly, very feminine, and I can't wait to wear it to a concert I'm going to next week. The pockets are really big I can fit my s8 in it easy, with zippers that's fantastic. I'm 5'5, 157 lbs, 36b cup and the large fits like a dream. Also got here in less than a week!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal H Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a faux leather look. Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This great jacket did not fit me as planned :( Sent a quick msg to Lock & Love and Amazon refunded my money within the hr via Paypal. I am beyond impressed with L&L's prompt customer service. As well as Amazon for once again going above and beyond for their customers. As for the jacket. It is exactly as advertised. For a faux leather look it really tricks the eye. Well made at a prime deal day price. I have purchased from this company multiple times and loved every item I have received.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, too short
customer_reviews.text: Jacket feels nice, great materials. I’m ordering a bigger size though because the jacket does fit shorter than I’d like it. Overall, color and materiel is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It's so cute and I get complements all the time. I bought it in 2 colors I loved it so much. I'm 5 for 4 132lbs and a 34 DD chest. It's fit everywhere well although it was a tiny bit tight in the chest, but that's normal for me. It wasn't tight enough to be restricting or feel like I needed to go up in size though.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Great look, but mind the size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket, both comfortable and stylish. I am glad I went up a size, so mind the size chart provided. I was a bit skeptical, but you should order a size up from your normal as described. I usually wear a large with comfort, but purchased an XL, which fits well as long as I wear something light underneath such as blouses. It would be very snug with something thicker such as a sweater. Great look and I like the versatility of it. BTW, this is not two separate jackets, only the hoodie and a front bib unzip and can be removed. The sleeves and bottom trim do not.
customer_reviews.author: AK Gal

customer_reviews.title: which was nice, and unexpected
customer_reviews.text: This jacket arrived with a broken zip on the removable hoodie portion. The company would have taken quite awhile to exchange it, and since I'm not interested in removing it, I kept it. It has a full lining, which was nice, and unexpected. I am 4'11", and a D cup, so I was wisely advised to order a large, which fits well (aside from some long sleeves, but that was expected). The zippers on the pockets are more decorative than functional, but the synthetic leather and details are of very good quality, and this jacket definitely doesn't look cheap on. Is it Jessica Jones' $6000 leather jacket? No. Is it comfortable and stylish on a 40 degree day? Definitely.
customer_reviews.author: the_midge

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt hold up well for the price
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very cute and fits well. I'm normally an XL, size 15 in jeans and the XXL fits perfect for layering other jackets underneath. I want to love this jacket but the interior of the pocket ripped a month after I received it and its already peeling! Its February 7th 2020 and I bought this mid December 2019. I've paid half the price for jackets that hold up longer. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised! Very wary of ordering clothes online but this is a quality jacket! It turned out great! I’m glad I got an XS because I usually wear it over a T-shirt in the spring/fall and definitely want it fitting well (not baggy). I’m 5’2” 113lbs 32D. XS was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great/Cute coat!!
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said, you have to size up or this won't fit. Definitely go by bust size on the size chart.. but the jacket is awesome, has a really cool factor to it and is cute/fitted; also warm. Just know that LL claims it's their coat and not a knock-off, but the real one... it's not. It's a Made by Johnny jacket as others have also noted. The company sent the right size quickly though, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket but no go
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this jacket but unfortunately the sleeves are entirely too long on me. I'm 5'3" 135 lbs and the jacket fit me great but I would've had to roll the sleeves. Back it went. I bought the jacket that has the sweatshirt style sleeves in a large for $29.99 and it's perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and warm
customer_reviews.text: This is actually one of the few items you buy online and they look waaay better than on screen!! :) Very nice quality, and warmer than I expected for Chicago weather. Hoodie is super convenient, I do not remove it because it's so cool on it, but just having the option to do it is great. Happy with this purchase. One thing you should consider though: Size UP. At least 2 sizes. I'm usually XS and had to return M because it was too tight for a jacket. Ended with an L size. Perfect. I'm 5'7" 136 lb. 36 chest 28 waist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long Arms, Fabulous Jackets
customer_reviews.text: I tried so hard! I love these jackets, and find the quality really great. I ordered a total of three, trying different styles and sizes trying to get the correct fit, but couldn’t get it right. The medium was too large overall, and the small fit nicely but the sleeves were soooo long on me. I’m disappointed, because truly, these jackets are awesome and the customer service was stellar to work with. My loss.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: I got a medium and the fit is ok, ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a medium and the fit is ok, a little short in the waist. It's a really cute jacket but mine has damage on it on the hood by where it joins to the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket!! Just not the hood of the hoody.
customer_reviews.text: Totally comfy. Totally cute. Totally warm. Love the way it looks and feels. Pockets a bit small. Sleeves are kinda long but I am kinda short so it's all good. Oh but the hood is way small. Clothing manufacturers needbto stop making the hoods of goodies so freaking small!!! Most humans are not pinheads!!!! I may be short, but I have a big melon and lots of hair, I need a big hood - not this tiny thing! Dude seriously!!!
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size larger than need
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome jacket; warmer than I thought it would be with the lining. I ordered an XXL instead of my usual jacket size of XL based on the suggestions of other reviewers and it fits well. Another reviewer also mentioned the sleeve lining is too long and sticks out which is true, but I pinned it up with some safety pins to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Spends Too Much

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I wear it all the time. I bought it for a concert and just loved how it looked. Fits well and is very comfortable. I was able to walk around downtown and stay warm but not get too hot going inside. Great addition to my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Breezer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and fits well, I ordered a medium as I fall somewhere on the small and medium size. Sometime I wear smalls and it's a great fit and sometimes I wear a medium and it's a great fit. This product- good thing I bought a medium. This jacket is not for someone taller than me! I'm 5'5", fits perfect in size and length but it will run small on you girls that that are taller. I'm a size 5, 34B... Fits perfect for one needing a medium., DONT GET THE SMALL if you are a size 4-6, get the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

product_meta.title: Lock and Love Women's Removable Hooded Faux Leather Moto Biker Jacket (XS~2XL)
feature_bullets: Faux leather jacket featuring a removal knit hood and front panel with exposed zipper
Pintucks details on shoulder, waist and sleeve
Double snap collar / Metal exposed front zipper placket and pockets / Fully lined
HAND WASH COLD / HANG TO DRY / DO NOT IRON / DO NOT DRY CLEAN

Please check the size chart below to ensure your order / Color Disclaimer : Due to monitor settings, monitor pixel definitions, we cannot guarantee that the color you see on your screen as an exact color of the product. We strive to make our colors as accurate as possible. however, colors are approximations of actual colors
